attributes.action: ensure that those professionals involved in the Baby P case are removed from their jobs and never allowed to work with Children again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all social workers, health visitors, doctors and council officals that failed to take action and protect Baby P should immediately be removed from their jobs and prevented from working with children ever again.  There must be severe consequneces for allowing anybody be it child, adult or OAP to live their life in terror, suffering and pain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
